about_the_game:
All on Board! is a revolutionary tabletop platform built from the ground up specifically for VR, created by and for board game enthusiasts. As the only platform natively built for VR, All on Board! fully exploits the capabilities of virtual reality to deliver an unmatched board gaming experience. This includes predictive selection and positioning of board elements while enjoying realistic physical interactions close to real life. A unique platform that is constantly evolving, both functionally and in its game catalog, packed with beloved franchises among board game enthusiasts.

Experience the joy of discovering new games, just like browsing the latest releases at your favorite store. All on Board! brings you shared moments of discussion, laughter, and nostalgia reminiscent of past adventures and unforgettable games. Now, thanks to the immersive power of virtual reality, you can relive these experiences and continue doing what you love most—without the hassle of travel or game setup.

Join our community of tabletop aficionados and contribute with your feedback to improve the platform every day!

  • Only one player is required to purchase game titles: If you own a game, you can invite your friends to play for free, just like in real life.

  • Experience interactions that are intuitive and naturally immersive.

  • Top-tier games meticulously adapted for VR, ensuring exceptional gameplay and smooth interactions.

  • Quickly learn the rules with in-game tutorials and contextual help that provides more information about any component.

  • Tailored gameplay for 1 to multiple players, including solo and co-op modes. You can even tackle cooperative games on your own!

  • Cross-platform support.

  • Play in your preferred language, with ongoing additions to our language support.

With many more to come!

  • Black Rose Wars

  • Hamlet

  • Infinity Defiance

  • Sword & Sorcery

  • The Breach

  • And others yet to be unveiled…

In addition to our board game titles, we also offer classic, free-to-play games that everyone knows and loves, including Chess,Checkers, and more to come!

Just like in real life, with a single copy of any of the licensed games, you can invite your friends to join in the fun. No hassles or complications, just straight to playing!

At All on Board!, we want to bring you the board game culture in the most authentic way, and that includes the way you play. We understand the importance of interacting with the game elements, so we’ve paid special attention to making it as natural and intuitive as possible. A VR board game simulator experience that's almost like playing in real life!

Our platform supports games for one to multiple players, offering rich experiences for solo adventurers, cooperative teams, and competitive groups alike. Our impersonation system allows you to switch roles seamlessly, enabling epic coop sessions, even if you are the only one playing!

Learning to play in All on Board! is very easy, thanks to the video tutorials available for each board game. Combined with the platform's very user-friendly interface and natural interactions, this makes starting any game quick and simple.

Additionally, you will find contextual descriptions of each game component, ensuring you always have a reference at hand, making it even easier to dive into new games with confidence.

We aim to make all licensed board games on the platform available in a variety of languages, reflecting our commitment to inclusivity. All on Board! is designed to welcome players from around the world, and we are working towards expanding our language options to reach even more of you.

No matter which platform you play All on Board! on, playing with your friends will never be an issue, thanks to the crossplay feature!

Elevate your gaming interactions with unique avatars, making every session feel more connected and personal. Bridge the gap between virtual and real-life play and enjoy an experience far beyond what a simple voice call can offer!

Leveraging VR technology, we've adapted each game to preserve the essence of board gaming while streamlining tasks such as setting up the game, managing components, and tallying scores. Every title has been meticulously adapted for VR, maintaining the original game experience while enhancing usability.
Maximize your gaming time and make the most of your leisure moments!

Exciting new games are on the horizon, featuring top-tier licenses that board game enthusiasts love. Each addition to our platform promises to be a must-play experience as we continue to bring beloved titles to life at an ever-increasing pace.

In addition to the growing catalog of games, All on Board! has many exciting features already in the works. Some of these, like the avatar editor and user-created content, are just a few of the updates set to arrive in the near future!

movies.name: All on Board! - Launch Date Announcement Trailer

name: All on Board!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB port
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 20 Series* / AMD Radeon RX 6000 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB-C port

short_description: Designed from the ground up for VR, All on Board! offers seamless board game experiences. Join this ever-evolving platform and connect with fellow board game enthusiasts! Choose your avatar and enjoy playing solo or with friends, diving into some of the most popular board game franchises.
